text: Ambikapur Part-X is a census town in Cachar district in the state of Assam, India. ==Demographics== India census, Ambikapur Part-X had a population of 10,014. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Ambikapur Part-X has an average literacy rate of 71%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 56% of the males and 44% of females literate. 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Cachar district Category:Silchar
title: Ambikapur Part-X
